name: YEET THE GIFT
description:
Yeet The Gift

 

“This year, there were many children who were not wise and who did not get a gift. So, there’s a lot of presents left in Santa’s workshops. The elves and Santa decided to fight a merciless battle with the rest of the toys to release the pressure accumulated before the holidays.

Your goal: You’ll have to throw gifts at the elves to score points, while avoiding enemy fire. At the end of the game, the team with the fewest points will have to obey each other for next Christmas, so aim right. Be careful, your shots are limited, remember to reload on one of the piles of gifts to not fall dry.


YEET THE GIFT is a single player FPS game where your objective is to kill as many elves as possible before the timer stops.

In order to do so, you will be given a gun with which you can shoot the elves. To avoid enemies shot, you can dash in a direction or shoot on their gift to protect yourself!


Keyboard : 

Z, Q, S, D – Move

Space – Jump

Left Shift – Dash

E – Reload 

Left Click – Shoot
QWERTY AVAILABLE!

Controller : 

Left Joystick – Move

Right Joystick – Camera

Cross or A – Jump

L1/L2 or LB/LT – Dash

Square or X – Reload 

R1/R2 or RB/RT – Shoot

Producer
Baptiste Figeac

Game Designers 
Alexandre Begis
Marcus Do Rego
Océane Famechon
Stanislas Rado

Programmers 
Noé Guillaumin
Théo Boldireff
Yannis de Macedo
Antoine Jeanselme

Artist 
Jason Hameon
Samuel Mebrek

This game was developed in 3 days for the CHRISTMAS UNREAL JAM  event which was organized by the Institut de l’internet et du multimédia in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so please enjoy it.

Merry Christmas to all! 🎅
